Upcoming events

Join our vibrant community through a variety of inclusive events designed for autistic expats and their families. Whether you're into books, nature walks, or fun-filled game nights, we have something for everyone.

NeuroNarratives

Book Club

Our book club is a great opportunity to connect with fellow readers, discuss ideas, and enjoy insightful conversations in a relaxing environment.

Current Read: Unmasking Autism, by Devon Price

Next Event: December 1, 15:00

Location: OBA Library

Game Night

Christmas Edition

Whether you're into board games or card games, it's a fun way to unwind and meet new people. For our December edition we'll have holiday season themed quiz and a fun sweater contest!

Team sizes: up to 5

Next Event: December 18, 19:00

Location: BarBario

The Wanderers

Nature Walks

Get some fresh air and connect with nature on an easy-paced walk.

Next Event: January 19, 10:30

Location: Het Twiske, a scenic nature reserve

Day Out

The Hague & Madurodam

A family-friendly day trip to The Hague and the Madurodam. Perfect for kids and adults alike!

Next Event: February 2nd

Location: Madurodam, miniature park in The Hague
